text: You thought you killed this family member, but now they’re out for your blood.
You insulted this family member so gravely that they left your life forever. They will return to settle the score.
You have always been better than this family member at something. They grew jealous and will return to best you.
You uncovered a secret about this family member. They now seek to unveil your darkest secret.
You and this family member have a friendly rivalry and constantly test each other's skills.
This family member owes you a debt. They’ll help you, but only to clear the slate.
This family member loves you but you were never close. They’ll help you as long as there is no risk of injury or death.
This family member caused you a horrible accident as a child and feels incredible guilt.
This family member left long ago, promising to return in your hour of greatest need.
This family member has always loved you with all their heart and would do anything for you.
